radiographic_examinations.findings: Appendix is slightly, diffusely enlarged to approximately 8mm diameter with ill-defined margins and mild adjacent fat stranding. No pneumonia at the lung bases. No pleural or pericardial effusion. Liver enhances homogeneously. No intra- or extra-hepatic biliary duct dilatation. Gallbladder and spleen are normal. Kidneys show small hypodensities bilaterally, no evidence of hydronephrosis. No bowel obstruction, no free air or stranding about the colon. No suspicious lytic or sclerotic lesions in osseous structures.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Small hypodensities in the right kidney are evaluated in more details on last MRI.
